name: Lizard Tunnel
description:
Made with Bitsy.

Art, gameplay, concept, and music by Hall-of-Fang-and-Claw (Thunder).

Thank you to @Shark_Dice, @reirabies, and @Irisgrimoire_ for help with the music. Thank you to @kaicubemain, Lazaro, Michele, and other beta testers who helped with the paper prototype and level suggestions.

Special thanks to @Mickanio for introducing me to  Bitsy!
